document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of species-group names assigned to Copris Geoffroy, Coptodactyla Burmeister, Litocopris Waterhouse, Microcopris Balthasar, Paracopris Balthasar, Pseudocopris Ferreira, Pseudopedaria Felsche, Sinocopris Ochi, Kon and Bai, and Thyregis Blackburn (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae: Coprini)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of species-group names assigned to Copris Geoffroy, Coptodactyla Burmeister, Litocopris Waterhouse, Microcopris Balthasar, Paracopris Balthasar, Pseudocopris Ferreira, Pseudopedaria Felsche, Sinocopris Ochi, Kon and Bai, and Thyregis Blackburn (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae: Coprini)

bibRefCitation.author: Geoffroy, E. L.
bibRefCitation.refString: Geoffroy, E. L. 1762. Histoire abregee des Insectes qui se trouvent aux environs de Paris, dans laquelle ces animaux sont ranges suivant un ordre methodique. Tome premiere. Durand; Paris. 523 p.
